Title: Lust for Royston Vasey
Plot: The nosebleed epidemic continues. Pauline gets a new job as an assistant food science operative at Burger Me! Herr Lipp and students arrive on an exchange visit from Diusberg, and the guesthouse closes for a very private function.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
Writer: Jeremy Dyson, Mark Gatiss, Steve Pemberton, Reece Sh
